QuickstartÂ¶

Eager to get started? This page gives a good introduction to Flask. It assumes you already have Flask installed. If you do not, head over to the Installation section.

A minimal Flask application looks something like this:

from flask import Flask
app = Flask(__name__)

@app.route('/')
def hello_world():
    return 'Hello World!'

if __name__ == '__main__':
    app.run()

Just save it as hello.py (or something similar) and run it with your Python interpreter. Make sure to not call your application flask.py because this would conflict with Flask itself.
